content.body: @mikbar-uib:matrix.org we should make sure that anyone who is not a delegate who is coming to our TG5 workshop has submitted the appropriate Ecma paperwork
content.formatted_body: @Mikhail Barash we should make sure that anyone who is not a delegate who is coming to our TG5 workshop has submitted the appropriate Ecma paperwork

content.body:
> <@michaelficarra:matrix.org> @mikbar-uib:matrix.org we should make sure that anyone who is not a delegate who is coming to our TG5 workshop has submitted the appropriate Ecma paperwork

Yes, we'll make sure that those who would like to speak during the "TG5 discussions" item on the agenda [ https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/528 ] will have signed the Contributor Agreement.
content.formatted_body:
In reply to @michaelficarra:matrix.org
@Mikhail Barash we should make sure that anyone who is not a delegate who is coming to our TG5 workshop has submitted the appropriate Ecma paperwork
Yes, we'll make sure that those who would like to speak during the "TG5 discussions" item on the agenda [ https://github.com/tc39/Reflector/issues/528 ] will have signed the Contributor Agreement.
